0.name: To Do List
0.description: To Do List made with HTML5, SCSS and JavaScript, using Local Storage. Created during the Bootcamp of the Student Self-Government of the Lodz University of Technology. (2023)

1.name: Dashboard for crypto currency
1.description: Javascript Application that allows you to organize the list of your tokens or cryptocurrencies. Based on Local Storage. App uses the Coingecko API. (2023)

2.name: Landing Page
2.description: Landing page made with HTML, SCSS during the Bootcamp of the Student Self-Government of the Lodz University of Technology. (2022)

3.name: Discord Sidebar Price Bots
3.description: JavaScript Application to display cryptocurrency data (price, percentage change in 24 hours, and symbol) as a Discord bot in users' sidebar. The current online status displays the RSI indicator. App uses the Coingecko API. (2022)

4.name: Portfolio - old version
4.description: First portfolio made in HTML, SCSS and JavaScript. (2022)

5.name: Woonerf POW
5.description: Visualization of Woonerf POW project, which involves the reconstruction of a fragment of Polska Organizacja Wojskowej street in Łódź into a woonerf. The aim of the redevelopment is to create an attractive space with a high level of security, non-exclusive and, above all, green space. (2022)

6.name: Bedroom
6.description: Visualization of a room that combines the function of an office and a bedroom. Project made in Blender. (2022)

7.name: Mouse Bungee
7.description: Visualization made in Fusion 360. Later, the project was printed on a 3D printer. (2022)
